article_node.title: Authorities Find Body Believed to Be 23-Year-Old Man Who Disappeared After Hailing a Ride to Rocky Mountain National Park
article_node.summary: Authorities have discovered a body believed to be that of Blake Kieckhafer, a 23-year-old man from Omaha, Nebraska, who went missing after taking a ride share to Rocky Mountain National Park on August 7. The remains were found above Emerald Lake, and search efforts began after his family reported him missing on August 11. The Larimer County Coroner's Office will confirm the identity of the body.
